about.intro: A Vue 3 starter focused on performance and polish, with clear hierarchy, lightweight motion, and consistent brand tone.
about.story: We refined the common page structure into a reusable skeleton that helps you prototype quickly and scale confidently.
about.mission: The goal is to keep every screen warm: visually restrained yet distinct, interactive without being flashy.

highlights.fast: Fast startup with a smooth developer experience.
highlights.modern: Modern frontend engineering, clean and maintainable.
highlights.beautiful: Detailed visual craft that builds trust.

about.stack: Stack: Vue 3 路 Vite 路 TypeScript 路 Vue Router 路 Pinia

home.title: Modern Vue Application
home.subtitle: High-performance modern application built with Vue 3 + TypeScript + Vite, featuring multi-language support

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Built with Vite for lightning-fast hot reload and build speeds
